name: Unmade: Shadowman (Demo)
description:
Duor is a world ruled by a benevolent organization called The Hand, who derive their power, both magical and political, from the deity known as the Unmade.

When one of these rulers goes rogue, the only one left to oppose him is a child, an apprentice of The Hand named Newk. But can a mere child overcome an evil wizard wielding divine power?

  • Retro pixelated graphics
  • Classic turn-based battle with new twists
  • Engaging story
  • Original soundtrack

*This game is a work in progress. Please comment about any bugs. I thank you for your support.*
